About the Company: Foods & Inns Ltd is a leading internationally reputed manufacturer and exporter of fruit pulp and concentrates in canned and aseptic packing, frozen pulp and vegetables, fruit powders etc.The company`s product range includes Aseptic-Mango Purees and Concentrates,White Guava Puree and Concentrates,Pink Guava Puree & Red Papaya Puree and Concentrate,Canning-Fruit Purees And Slices,Vegetables in Brine,Pickles And Chutneys & Curried Patra,Frozen- Fruits ,Purees and Chunks,Vegetables,Snacks & Chutneys,Powder-Fruits & Vegetables.
